text: You can't do the bullets button method. Have to use their image based method
Is there no way to get the code then utilise it in a custom way?
Well, theoretically you could figure out how the url is generated and generate your own tired to a cta you're not actually using
But can't garuntee that would work
Fair enough, I'll stick with images.

You could use the embed code, grab the href from that and use it with the bulletproof button code. Only issue with that is that you wont get the "views, click rate, or locations" data portion of the button data. I believe the clicks still get registered though as thats counted when they visit the cta url and are redirected
Not sure that data is valuable to the client, they're not about lead volume, they target very high value clients.
